item.description:
Have you ever been to a Murder Mystery Party, well this one our third party, everyone loved it the first time, it's is lot's of fun! This event will be at the Odiorne Point State Park, we will be meeting in the "Science Center" there. One of our members graciously offered us the place for this party!


This game is not a board game; everyone will be participating at the same time; you must not be afraid of the dark, and you must dress all in black clothing! This is not a show ( the Murder Mystery Show is a week earlier on March 13th at the Governors Inn, you don't want to miss that one)

We will be having a potluck before the game so bring something special. We will meet at 6 pm to socialize at which time I will explain the game and give a brief tour of the building then at 7pm the mystery will start. This is not a child event so please do not bring your children.

I anticipate we will have a fairly large amount of people coming so I will be limiting the number of people for this event to 85. I may be combining this with some other meetup groups.
More details will follow as we get closer to the event.

Please wear sneakers or comfortable walking shoes. ***Remember to wear nothing but "black clothing"***

After the event we will be dancing/socialing next to the "Tidal Pool" so bring your dancing shoes!

Hi I would like everyone to know that this event is a "no-alcohol event", so please do not bring any alchol to the event. Also, do not follow the link for directions here. It is way off. Go to www.seacoastsciencecenter.org. Did I tell you that the bridge is out for repairs so follow the seacoastsciencecenter.org link for the best directions.

If you have any questions call me at 603-509-2907.

Organized by the "Trailblazers Meetup Group"

We will be making a contribution to the Science Center ~ Cost $7.

If anyone want to help me on this event I would appreciate it!

See you there for a wonderful special night!

Peter

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Murder Mystery Party
